string.value: |Kantan'na tatakaide wa nakatta. Soshite karera ni kono kubi ga atae raremashita. Karera wa kanojo o doo suru tsumoridesu ka?
|Mazuwa hontai kara kirihanasu hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Kiyoo-sa o shimesanakereba narimasen.
|Junbi ga dekite. Modotte mo ii yo, atama ga itai nda.
|Ano kirakira wa nanidesu ka? Kore wa Orakuru ga hanashita koto to nite iru yoodesu.
|Renraku arimasu yo! Moohitotsu mitsukeru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.
|Ima, hitsuyoonamono wa subete sorotte imasu. Orakuru ni modoru toki ga kimashita.
|Saisho no shuurikoo ga genba ni imasu. Kare wa nante hayaku shigoto ni torikakatta nodeshou!
|Betsu no shuurikoo ga shigoto ni torikakatta. Saigo ni nokotta no wa.
|Saigo no shuurikoo no junbi ga totonoimashita! Kore ga Orakuru no kioku o torimodosu no ni yakudatsu koto o negatte imasu.
|Ryokoo-chuu ni takusan mite kimashita. Hata ni mo kon'na konseki ga nokotte imasu. Dare ga karera o okizari ni suru nodeshou ka?
|Middogarudo no kagaku-sha ga kono nazo o hodoku no o tetsudatte kurerudeshou.
|Tsuuro ga sema sugimasu. Watashi no torakku wa koko o toorenaishi, aruku ni wa kiken sugiru.
|Motto chiisai kuruma o sagasu hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Koko no chikaku ni hitsuyoonamono ga atta to omoimasu.
|Kono kuruma o koko ni oite kita hito ni kansha shimasu. Kore de koojoo-nai ni hairu koto ga dekimasu.
|Chotto karite mo dare mo okoranai to omoimasu. Saa, kyuuyu, tenka, enjin o kakemasu!
|Kuso, soshite sono kuruma wa yookida!
|Sokode wa hoka ni nani mo suru koto ga arimasen.
|Kaibutsu ga yattekimasu. Kare ga jihatsu-teki ni atama o hooki suru kanoosei wa hikui tame, kare wa tatakawanakereba narimasen.
|Kiken'na aitedakedo, watashinara daijoobu!
|Kon'na kyodaina iseki wa mita koto ga nai… shinsaizen wa koko ni nani ga atta ndarou?
|Shoomen genkan wa fuusa sa rete irunode, senro-zoi o kuruma de hashitte mimasu.
Toonan-sha o motta mama koojoo no shikichi kara deru koto wa dekimasen.
Kono eria o hanaretaidesu ka?
